name: Stuck in Traffic
description:
A car crash is blocking the freeway, so sit back and relax to whatever's on the radio, because you're gonna be here for a while.

Controls

  • Brake - S
  • Steer - A D
  • Gas - W
  • Shift gear - E
  • Change radio station - Q

Credits

  • Car sprites - https://edusilvart.itch.io/sprite-stack-cars
  • Car sound effects - https://touati.itch.io/car-game-sfx-pack
  • Roads - https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-isometric-road-blocks-free-sprites (modified)
  • Font - https://caffinate.itch.io/fibberish
  • Songs - https://rustedstudio.itch.io/free-music-lofi-tracks FabienC@RustedMusicStudio

If you're not having fun, well neither is waiting in a traffic jam, so I guess I did my job well.
